trans-unit.source: Upload a custom image for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Upload a custom image for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Learn how to upload a custom image for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Learn how to upload a custom image for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Upload a custom image for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Upload a custom image for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Now that you have created your custom template image or have updated it with changes, you need to upload that image to your Azure RemoteApp image library.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have created your custom template image or have updated it with changes, you need to upload that image to your Azure RemoteApp image library.

trans-unit.source: Use these steps.
trans-unit.target: Use these steps.

trans-unit.source: Before you start
trans-unit.target: Before you start

trans-unit.source: Verify your custom image meets the [image requirements](remoteapp-imagereqs.md) and [application requirements](remoteapp-appreqs.md).
trans-unit.target: Verify your custom image meets the [image requirements](remoteapp-imagereqs.md) and [application requirements](remoteapp-appreqs.md).

trans-unit.source: Install the [Azure PowerShell module](../install-configure-powershell.md).
trans-unit.target: Install the [Azure PowerShell module](../install-configure-powershell.md).

trans-unit.source: Step by step on how to upload custom image
trans-unit.target: Step by step on how to upload custom image

trans-unit.source: Open Azure Management Portal and navigate to the RemoteApp page.
trans-unit.target: Open Azure Management Portal and navigate to the RemoteApp page.

trans-unit.source: On the **Template images** tab, click **Upload** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: On the **Template images** tab, click **Upload** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Enter a friendly name for your image and specify the storage account location.
trans-unit.target: Enter a friendly name for your image and specify the storage account location.

trans-unit.source: Ensure the location is the same location as your RemoteApp collection or a location where you want to create one.
trans-unit.target: Ensure the location is the same location as your RemoteApp collection or a location where you want to create one.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, download the script to your local PC.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, download the script to your local PC.

trans-unit.source: Copy the command parameters in the text box to your clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Copy the command parameters in the text box to your clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Open an elevated Windows PowerShell window.
trans-unit.target: Open an elevated Windows PowerShell window.

trans-unit.source: From the elevated Windows PowerShell window, navigate to the same directory where you downloaded the script.
trans-unit.target: From the elevated Windows PowerShell window, navigate to the same directory where you downloaded the script.

trans-unit.source: Paste the copied command and press **Enter**.
trans-unit.target: Paste the copied command and press **Enter**.

trans-unit.source: The upload process will begin and duration may depend on many factors including your network speed and size of the image
trans-unit.target: The upload process will begin and duration may depend on many factors including your network speed and size of the image

trans-unit.source: If your upload does not succeed because of network interruption or things like that, you can always resume the upload process you began.
trans-unit.target: If your upload does not succeed because of network interruption or things like that, you can always resume the upload process you began.

trans-unit.source: To resume an upload, run the script again using the same command line.
trans-unit.target: To resume an upload, run the script again using the same command line.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.WARNING] Never modify the upload script.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.WARNING] Never modify the upload script.

trans-unit.source: Specific checks have been implemented to ensure that the image meets the image requirements and application requirements.
trans-unit.target: Specific checks have been implemented to ensure that the image meets the image requirements and application requirements.

trans-unit.source: Common problems
trans-unit.target: Common problems

trans-unit.source: Make sure you use Windows PowerShell, not Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you use Windows PowerShell, not Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: You need to install the Azure PowerShell module because certain modules are needed during the upload process.
trans-unit.target: You need to install the Azure PowerShell module because certain modules are needed during the upload process.

trans-unit.source: Never alter the script, validations are there for your convenience.
trans-unit.target: Never alter the script, validations are there for your convenience.

trans-unit.source: If the vhd file gets locked out during upload, copy the file or move it to a new location and attempt upload again.
trans-unit.target: If the vhd file gets locked out during upload, copy the file or move it to a new location and attempt upload again.

trans-unit.source: There might be some Windows process that is preventing upload.
trans-unit.target: There might be some Windows process that is preventing upload.
